quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an fast paced round of TextWorld? You do! Your task for today is to pick-up the Canadian style key from the floor of the launderette.

Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to lift the Canadian style key from the floor of the launderette. With the Canadian style key, attempt to venture south. Then, make an effort to go to the east. And then, close the Canadian style chest in the restroom. And then, assure the Canadian style chest is locked. That's it!
commands: lock Canadian style chest with Canadian style key
lock Canadian style chest with Canadian style key

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You're now in the restroom.

 You can see a Canadian style chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The Canadian style chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The Canadian style chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a safe. Classic TextWorld.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The safe is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a parlor. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a bar. [if there is something on the s_0]On the bar you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bar.[end if] You make out a bed stand. The bed stand is typical.[if there is something on the s_1] On the bed stand you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a launderette. A normal kind of place.

 You can see a board. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the board. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing is empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: Canadian style chest
infos.desc: The Canadian style chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that typical thing.

infos.name: Canadian style key
infos.desc: The metal of the Canadian style key is rusty.

infos.name: nest of bugs
infos.desc: The nest of bugs would seem to be out of place here

infos.name: bed stand
infos.desc: The bed stand is solidly built.

infos.name: board
infos.desc: The board is an unstable piece of garbage.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

walkthrough: lock Canadian style chest with Canadian style key

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to retrieve the Canadian style key from the floor of the launderette. And then, attempt to go to the south. If you can manage that, try to venture east. Then, close the Canadian style chest in the restroom. And then, lock the Canadian style chest in the restroom. And if you do that, you're the winner!
